existing_features.title: When the Gallery is in multi-select mode (i.e., selectionMode is true and at least one item is selected), ensure the bulk action bar containing the actions "Folder", "Mission", "Share", "Download", and "Delete" is visually and interactively in front of (above) the floating "Folders" and "Missions" buttons/icons so the actions are always clearly visible and tappable.

new_feature_requests.summary: Gallery multi-select: show bulk action options (folder, mission, share, download, delete) in front of the folder/mission icons so they are clearly visible/selectable

projectName: Ensure gallery bulk action bar overlays Folder/Missions floating buttons during multi-select
